name: ai-model-2.0-landing
description: Professional landing page for AI Model 2.0 system built with Astro + Tailwind CSS + Telegram WebApp
author: coolpac

scripts.dev:tunnel: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4321 && ngrok http 4321"
scripts.dev:cloudflare: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:4321 && cloudflared tunnel --url http://localhost:4321"
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=ai-model-landing
